plentry.pd: URL of the filler image. Currently supports JPEG, JPG, PNG, and GIF formats. You can add filler images from local absolute or relative paths.
Video frame rate. Value range: [1,30]. Default is 1.

URL of the placeholder image. Currently supports JPEG, JPG, PNG, and GIF formats. You can add a placeholder image from a local absolute or relative path. On Android, adding placeholder images from /assets/ is not supported.
Video frame rate, ranging from [1,30]. Default is 1.

URL of the placeholder image. Currently supports JPEG, JPG, PNG, and GIF formats. You can add placeholder images from local absolute or relative paths. On Android, adding placeholder images from /assets/ is not supported.
Video frame rate. Value range is [1,30]. Default value is 1.

The URL of the placeholder image. Currently supports JPEG, JPG, PNG, and GIF formats. You can add a placeholder image from a local absolute or relative path. On Android, adding placeholder images from /assets/ is not supported.
Video frame rate, ranging from [1, 30]. The default value is 1.
